info.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters.

firstName.pattern: First Name cannot have number and special characters.

firstName.maxlength: First Name cannot be longer than 15 characters.

lastName.maxlength: Last Name cannot be longer than 15 characters.

middleName.maxlength: Middle Name cannot be longer than 15 characters.

dob.future: Date of Birth cannot be future.

treatmentPerDay.max: Protocol Treatment per Day is invalid

minPressure.max: Minimum Pressure should be between 1 to 10
